content: CALGARY  Alberta Canada's Enbridge Inc said on Wednesday it would cut about 1 000 positions  or 6 percent of its work force  after buying Spectra Energy Corp of Houston  the first layoffs for the combined energy infrastructure company  the biggest in North America.
name: Sea Limited
title: Canada's Enbridge to cut 1 000 jobs after buying Spectra

content: CALGARY  Alberta  March 22 Canada's Enbridge Inc  said on Wednesday it would cut about 1 000 positions  or 6 percent of its work force  after buying Spectra Energy Corp  of Houston  the first layoffs for the combined energy infrastructure company  the biggest in North America.
name: Sea Limited
title: UPDATE 2-Canada's Enbridge to cut 1 000 jobs after buying Spectra

content: WASHINGTON  Feb 16 Energy infrastructure firms Enbridge Inc and Spectra Energy Corp have agreed to settle charges their merger would hurt competition in the market for gas pipeline transportation in three areas off the Louisiana coast  the Federal Trade Commission said on Thursday.

content: Sept 6 Enbridge Inc  Canada's largest pipeline company  said  on Tuesday it would buy Spectra Energy Corp in an all-stock deal valued at about C$37 billion ($28 billion) to create the largest North American energy infrastructure company.
name: Sea Limited
title: Enbridge to buy Spectra Energy in C$37 bln deal

content: HOUSTON Spectra Energy Corp  shut its Platte Pipeline that carries crude oil from Guernsey  Wyoming  to Wood River  Illinois  as a precaution due to flooding on the Mississippi River  the company said.
name: Sea Limited
title: Spectra shuts Wyoming to Illinois crude pipeline due to flooding

content: Spectra Energy Corp   an oil and natural gas pipeline company  is bidding for the whole of Williams Companies Inc   even though its market capitalization is about half that of Williams  people familiar with the matter said.
name: Sea Limited
title: Exclusive: Spectra bidding for the entirety of Williams Cos - sources

content: CALGARY  July 14 Canada's national energy regulator has ordered Spectra Energy Corp to correct a series of "management system failures" following more than two dozen safety and security incidents at its Canadian plants and facilities since 2014.
name: Sea Limited
title: Canada regulator orders Spectra Energy to clean up practices

content: CALGARY  Alberta  July 9 Spectra Energy Corp's  280 000-barrel-per-day Express pipeline cannot pull crude oil from Gibson Energy Inc's Hardisty  Alberta terminal  where a booster pump is being repaired  a spokesman for Spectra said on Thursday.
name: Sea Limited
title: Spectra Express pipeline volumes dip on Gibson terminal repair work

content: CALGARY  Alberta  April 29 Pipeline company Spectra Energy Corp is cutting 170 jobs as it consolidates positions at its Calgary and Vancouver offices in western Canada  the company said on Wednesday.
name: Sea Limited
title: UPDATE 1-Spectra Energy says cutting 170 jobs in western Canada

content: CALGARY  Alberta  April 29 Pipeline and midstream company Spectra Energy told employees on Wednesday it is cutting around 170 jobs in western Canada  two market sources said.
name: Sea Limited
title: Spectra Energy cutting around 170 jobs in western Canada - sources
